subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Giants receiver Plaxico Burress was fined $45,000 by the N.F.L. for verbally abusing an official and tossing a ball into the stands during last weekend’s game against San Francisco. Burress was fined $20,000 for comments he made to the head linesman Phil McKinnely after he was called for an unsportsmanlike conduct penalty, and $20,000 for postgame comments critical of the officiating. Burress was assessed a $5,000 fine for throwing a ball into the stands after catching a touchdown pass in the third quarter.
